trans-unit.source: Provides an HTTP-specific implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 類別的 HTTP 特定實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> class provides support for the properties and methods defined in <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and for additional properties and methods that enable the user to interact directly with servers using HTTP.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>類別會提供支援的屬性和方法定義在<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>以及其他屬性和方法，讓使用者直接與使用 HTTP 伺服器互動。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to initialize new <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來初始化新<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>物件。

trans-unit.source: If the scheme for the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is `http://` or `https://`, <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> returns an <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> object.
trans-unit.target: 配置的統一資源識別元 (URI) 是否`http://`或`https://`，<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>傳回<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method makes a synchronous request to the resource specified in the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.RequestUri%2A> property and returns an <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse> that contains the response object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>方法讓一項同步要求中指定的資源<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.RequestUri%2A>屬性，並傳回<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>，其中包含回應物件。

trans-unit.source: The response data can be received by using the stream returned by <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可接收回應資料，請使用所傳回的資料流<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the response object or the response stream is closed, remaining data will be forfeited.
trans-unit.target: 如果回應物件或回應資料流已關閉，將會失效剩餘資料。

trans-unit.source: The remaining data will be drained and the socket will be re-used for subsequent requests when closing the response object or stream if the following conditions hold: it's a keep-alive or pipelined request, only a small amount of data needs to be received, or the remaining data is received in a small time interval.
trans-unit.target: 其餘資料將會耗盡，關閉回應物件或資料流，如果下列條件時，通訊端將會重複使用的後續要求： 它是為 keep-alive 或管線的要求，只有少量的資料必須收到，或小型時間間隔內接收到剩餘的資料。

trans-unit.source: If none of the mentioned conditions hold or the drain time is exceeded, the socket will be closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果所述條件保存或超過清空時間，將會關閉通訊端。

trans-unit.source: For keep-alive or pipelined connections, we strongly recommend that the application reads the streams until EOF.
trans-unit.target: 為 keep-alive 或以管線連接，我們強烈建議在應用程式讀取資料流，直到 EOF。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the socket will be re-used for subsequent requests resulting in better performance and less resources used.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保通訊端，皆套用於後續要求產生較佳的效能和較低的資源使用。

trans-unit.source: When you want to send data to the resource, the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> method returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to use to send data.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要將資料傳送至資源，<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.IO.Stream>物件用來傳送資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> and <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> methods provide asynchronous access to the send data stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>和<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法提供非同步傳送資料流存取。

trans-unit.source: For client authentication with <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>, the client certificate must be installed in the My certificate store of the current user.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端驗證具有<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>，用戶端憑證必須安裝在目前使用者的憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> class throws a <xref:System.Net.WebException> when errors occur while accessing a resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>類別會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException>何時存取資源的時候發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property contains a <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus> value that indicates the source of the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性包含<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>值，指出錯誤的來源。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.ProtocolError?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> property contains the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse> received from the resource.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>是<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.ProtocolError?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>屬性包含<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>接收到來自資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> exposes common HTTP header values sent to the Internet resource as properties, set by methods, or set by the system; the following table contains a complete list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> 公開一般 HTTP 標頭值傳送至網際網路資源做為屬性，設定方法，或是由系統; 所設定下表包含完整的清單。

trans-unit.source: You can set other headers in the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Headers%2A> property as name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定其他標頭<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Headers%2A>屬性當做名稱/值組。

trans-unit.source: Note that servers and caches may change or add headers during the request.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，伺服器和快取可能會變更或加入要求期間的標頭。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the HTTP headers that are set either by properties or methods or the system.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能是屬性或方法或系統所設定的 HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: Header
trans-unit.target: 頁首

trans-unit.source: Set by
trans-unit.target: 設定

trans-unit.target: 接受

trans-unit.source: Set by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Accept%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Accept%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Connection
trans-unit.target: 連線

trans-unit.source: Set by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Connection%2A> property, <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Connection%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Content-Length
trans-unit.target: 內容長度

trans-unit.source: Set by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Content-Type
trans-unit.target: Content-Type

trans-unit.source: Set by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Expect
trans-unit.target: 預期

trans-unit.source: Set by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Expect%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Expect%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Date
trans-unit.target: 日期

trans-unit.source: Set by the system to current date.
trans-unit.target: 設定由系統目前的日期。

trans-unit.source: Host
trans-unit.target: 主機

trans-unit.source: Set by the system to current host information.
trans-unit.target: 設定由系統目前的主機資訊。

trans-unit.source: If-Modified-Since
trans-unit.target: 如果修改自

trans-unit.source: Set by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.IfModifiedSince%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.IfModifiedSince%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Range
trans-unit.target: 範圍

trans-unit.source: Set by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Referer
trans-unit.target: 推薦者

trans-unit.source: Set by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Referer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Referer%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Transfer-Encoding
trans-unit.target: 傳輸編碼

trans-unit.source: Set by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.TransferEncoding%2A> property (the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked%2A> property must be `true`).
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.TransferEncoding%2A>屬性 (<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked%2A>屬性必須是`true`)。

trans-unit.target: 使用者代理程式

trans-unit.source: Set by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.UserAgent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.UserAgent%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> is registered automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> 會自動註冊。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix%2A> method to register <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> before using URIs beginning with `http://` or `https://`.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要呼叫<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.RegisterPrefix%2A>方法，登錄<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType>之前使用 Uri 開頭為`http://`或`https://`。

trans-unit.source: The local computer or application config file may specify that a default proxy be used.
trans-unit.target: 在本機電腦或應用程式組態檔，可以指定使用預設 proxy。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Proxy%2A> property is specified, then the proxy settings from the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Proxy%2A> property override the local computer or application config file and the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> instance will use the proxy settings specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Proxy%2A>指定屬性，然後從的 proxy 設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Proxy%2A>屬性覆寫在本機電腦或應用程式組態檔和<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>執行個體會使用指定的 proxy 設定。

trans-unit.source: If no proxy is specified in a config file and the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Proxy%2A> property is unspecified, the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> class uses the proxy settings inherited from Internet Explorer on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何 proxy 在組態檔中指定了和<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Proxy%2A>屬性並未指定，<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>類別會使用繼承自 Internet Explorer，在本機電腦上的 proxy 設定。

trans-unit.source: If there are no proxy settings in Internet Explorer, the request is sent directly to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在 Internet Explorer proxy 設定，會將要求傳送到伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> class parses a proxy bypass list with wildcard characters inherited from Internet Explorer differently than the bypass list is parsed directly by Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>類別與繼承自 Internet Explorer 以不同的方式略過清單直接由 Internet Explorer 剖析非萬用字元剖析 proxy 略過清單。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> class will parse a bypass list of "nt*" from Internet Explorer as a regular expression of "nt.$".
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>類別將會剖析的"nt *"與 Internet Explorer 略過清單做為規則運算式的 「 nt。 $"。

trans-unit.source: This differs from the native behavior of Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 這不同於 Internet Explorer 的原生行為。

trans-unit.source: So a URL of "`http://intxxxxx`" would bypass the proxy using the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> class, but would not bypass the proxy using Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 因此的 URL"`http://intxxxxx`」 會略過 proxy 使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>類別，但不是會略過使用 Internet Explorer 的 proxy。

trans-unit.source: The Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 架構快取的 SSL 工作階段建立時，並嘗試盡可能重複使用快取的工作階段為新的要求。

trans-unit.source: When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 當嘗試重複使用的 SSL 工作階段，架構會使用第一個項目<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>（如果有一個），或嘗試重複使用匿名的工作階段，如果<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>是空的。

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, cookies are disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 基於安全性理由，預設會停用 cookie。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use cookies, use the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.CookieContainer%2A> property to enable cookies.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用 cookie，使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.CookieContainer%2A>屬性來啟用 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.6 包含新的安全性功能會封鎖不安全的加密與雜湊演算法的連線。

trans-unit.source: Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as HttpClient, HttpWebRequest, FTPClient, SmtpClient, SslStream, etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default.
trans-unit.target: 使用 TLS/SSL 透過例如 HttpClient、 HttpWebRequest、 FTPClient、 SmtpClient、 SslStream 」 等的 Api，並以.NET Framework 4.6 為目標的應用程式預設會取得更安全的行為。

trans-unit.source: Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services OR TLS w/ RC4 services.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可能想要取消這個行為，以維護與 RC4 服務以其現有 SSL3 服務或 TLS 的互通性。

trans-unit.source: [This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled.
trans-unit.target: [這篇文章](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494)說明如何修改您的程式碼，讓新的行為會停用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> for the URI http://www.contoso.com/.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>uri http://www.contoso.com/。

trans-unit.source: to access the requested URI or any URI that the request is redirected to.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取要求的 URI 或任何已重新導向至的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Connect" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Connect" />

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that contains the information required to serialize the new <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件，包含將新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> 物件序列化所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the new <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 物件，包含與新 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> 物件關聯的序列化資料流的來源和目的端。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> class from the specified instances of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 類別的已指定執行個體，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An application must run in full trust mode when using serialization.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化時，應用程式必須以完全信任模式執行。

trans-unit.source: for unrestricted access to network resources.
trans-unit.target: 不受限制存取網路資源。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Cancels a request to an Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 取消對網際網路資源的要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Abort%2A> method cancels a request to a resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Abort%2A>方法取消資源的要求。

trans-unit.source: After a request is canceled, calling the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>, <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>, <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> method causes a <xref:System.Net.WebException> with the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property set to <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.RequestCanceled>.
trans-unit.target: 要求取消之後，呼叫<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>， <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>， <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>， <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法會使<xref:System.Net.WebException>與<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.RequestCanceled>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Abort%2A> method will synchronously execute the callback specified to the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> or <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> methods if the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Abort%2A> method is called while either of these operations are outstanding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Abort%2A>方法會以同步方式執行指定的回呼<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>或<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法如果<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Abort%2A>任一這些作業未完成時，會呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: This can lead to potential deadlock issues.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會導致潛在的死結問題。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e993b7c3-087f-45d8-9c02-9dded936d804).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e993b7c3-087f-45d8-9c02-9dded936d804)。

trans-unit.source: In the case of asynchronous requests, it is the responsibility of the client application to implement its own time-out mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 如果非同步要求，它負責用戶端應用程式，來實作其本身的逾時機制。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to do this.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行這項操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see langword="Accept" /> HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see langword="Accept" /> HTTP 標頭的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see langword="Accept" /> HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Accept" /> HTTP 標頭的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: To clear the `Accept` HTTP header, set the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Accept%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除`Accept`設定 HTTP 標頭，<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Accept%2A>屬性`null`。

trans-unit.source: The value for this property is stored in <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值儲存在 <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> 中。

trans-unit.source: If WebHeaderCollection is set, the property value is lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果有設定 WebHeaderCollection，將會遺失屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Accept%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Accept%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a range header to the request.
trans-unit.target: 將範圍標頭加入至要求。

trans-unit.source: Since all HTTP entities are represented in HTTP messages as sequences of bytes, the concept of a byte range is meaningful for any HTTP entity.

trans-unit.source: For this example, the `rangeSpecifier` parameter would be specified as "bytes" and the `range` parameter would be -99.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`rangeSpecifier`參數會指定為 「 位元組 」 和`range`參數便是-99。

trans-unit.source: A HTTP server indicates support for Range headers with the Accept-Ranges header in the response.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 伺服器表示接受範圍標頭會在回應中的範圍標頭的支援。

trans-unit.source: An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that supports byte-ranges would be as follows:
trans-unit.target: 從支援位元組範圍的伺服器接受範圍標頭的範例應如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If an Accept-Ranges header is not received in the header of the response from the server, then the server does not support Range headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果接受範圍標頭未收到來自伺服器的回應標頭中，伺服器不支援範圍標頭。

trans-unit.source: An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that does not support ranges, but recognizes the Accept-Ranges header, would be as follows:
trans-unit.target: 將伺服器不支援的範圍，但可辨識的接受範圍標頭的接受範圍標頭的範例應如下所示：

trans-unit.source: When receiving the response from a range request, only the HTTP headers associated with the entire request are parsed and made available via properties on the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: 只有 HTTP 標頭與整個要求相關聯時收到來自 「 範圍 」 要求的回應，被剖析，並透過屬性提供<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>類別。

trans-unit.source: Headers associated with each range are returned in the response.
trans-unit.target: 在回應中傳回的每個範圍相關聯的標頭。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rangeSpecifier" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: The starting or ending point of the range.
trans-unit.target: 範圍的起始和結束點。

trans-unit.source: Adds a Range header to a request for a specific range from the beginning or end of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 針對從已要求資料的起始或結尾的特定範圍，將範圍標頭加入至要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method adds a Range header to the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會將範圍標頭加入要求。

trans-unit.source: If `range` is positive, the `range` parameter specifies the starting point of the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果`range`是正數，`range`參數指定之範圍的起點。

trans-unit.source: The server should start sending data from the `range` parameter specified to the end of the data in the HTTP entity.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器應開始傳送資料，從`range`參數指定為 [HTTP] 實體中資料的結尾。

trans-unit.source: If `range` is negative, the `range` parameter specifies the ending point of the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果`range`是負數，`range`參數指定之範圍的結束點。

trans-unit.source: The server should start sending data from the start of the data in the HTTP entity to the `range` parameter specified.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器應開始傳送資料，從 HTTP 實體中的資料開始`range`指定參數。

trans-unit.source: Since all HTTP entities are represented in HTTP messages as sequences of bytes, the concept of a byte range is meaningful for any HTTP entity.
trans-unit.target: 因為所有的 HTTP 實體會表示為位元組序列的 HTTP 訊息，位元組範圍的概念是對任何 HTTP 實體有意義的。

trans-unit.source: However, not all clients and servers need to support byte-range operations.
trans-unit.target: 不過，並非所有的用戶端和伺服器需要支援位元組範圍作業。

trans-unit.source: The Range header on a request allows a client to request that it only wants to receive some part of the specified range of bytes in an HTTP entity.
trans-unit.target: 要求的範圍標頭可讓用戶端要求，它只想要在 HTTP 實體中接收指定的位元組範圍的某些部分。

trans-unit.source: Servers are not required to support Range header requests.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器不需要支援範圍標頭的要求。

trans-unit.source: The `rangeSpecifier` parameter would normally be specified as a "bytes", since this is the only range specifier recognized by most HTTP servers.
trans-unit.target: `rangeSpecifier`參數會通常指定為"bytes"，因為這是唯一可辨識大部分的 HTTP 伺服器的範圍規範。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `rangeSpecifier` parameter to some other string allows support for custom range specifiers other than bytes (the byte-range specifier defined in RFC 2616 by the IETF).
trans-unit.target: 設定`rangeSpecifier`某些其他字串的參數允許支援位元組 （由 IETF RFC 2616 中定義的位元組範圍規範） 以外的自訂範圍規範。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the Internet resource that actually responds to the request.
trans-unit.target: 取得實際回應要求的網際網路資源統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that identifies the Internet resource that actually responds to the request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，識別實際回應要求的網際網路資源。

trans-unit.source: The default is the URI used by the <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.Create(System.String)" /> method to initialize the request.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="M:System.Net.WebRequest.Create(System.String)" /> 方法用來初始化要求的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Address%2A> property is set to the URI after any redirections that happen during the request are complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Address%2A>屬性設定為 URI 要求期間發生任何重新導向完成後。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the original request is kept in the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.RequestUri%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 原始要求的 URI 會保留在<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.RequestUri%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example checks to see if the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> object `req` was redirected to another location to fulfill the request, and sets the value of the `hasChanged` variable to `true` if the request was redirected; otherwise `hasChanged` is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會檢查是否<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>物件`req`已重新導向至另一個位置來完成要求，並將值設定`hasChanged`變數設為`true`如果要求已重新導向; 否則`hasChanged`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the request should follow redirection responses.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指出要求是否應該緊接在重新導向回應之後。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the request should automatically follow redirection responses from the Internet resource; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求應該自動追蹤來自網際網路資源的重新導向回應，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowAutoRedirect%2A> to `true` if you want the request to automatically follow HTTP redirection headers to the new location of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowAutoRedirect%2A>至`true`如果您想要求資源的新位置會自動遵循 HTTP 重新導向標頭。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of redirections to follow is set by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.MaximumAutomaticRedirections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要遵循重新導向的最大數目由所設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.MaximumAutomaticRedirections%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowAutoRedirect%2A> is set to `false`, all responses with an HTTP status code from 300 to 399 is returned to the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowAutoRedirect%2A>設`false`，所有回應的 HTTP 狀態碼從 300 399 會傳都回到應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The Authorization header is cleared on auto-redirects and <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> automatically tries to re-authenticate to the redirected location.
trans-unit.target: 授權標頭會清除上自動重新導向和<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>自動嘗試重新驗證重新導向的位置。

trans-unit.source: In practice, this means that an application can't put custom authentication information into the Authorization header if it is possible to encounter redirection.
trans-unit.target: 在實務上，這表示如果它是可能發生的重新導向應用程式無法將自訂驗證的授權標頭資訊。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the application must implement and register a custom authentication module.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，應用程式必須實作並註冊自訂驗證模組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager?displayProperty=nameWithType> and related class are used to implement a custom authentication module.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager?displayProperty=nameWithType>和相關的類別用來實作自訂驗證模組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.Register%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method registers a custom authentication module.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.Register%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法註冊的自訂驗證模組。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowAutoRedirect%2A> property to allow the request to follow redirection responses.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowAutoRedirect%2A>屬性，以允許遵循重新導向回應要求。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to buffer the received from the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要緩衝處理從網際網路資源接收的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable buffering of the data received from the Internet resource; <see langword="false" /> to disable buffering.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要對從網際網路資源接收的資料啟用緩衝處理，<see langword="false" /> 則表示要停用緩衝處理。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to buffer the data sent to the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要緩衝傳送至網際網路資源的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable buffering of the data sent to the Internet resource; <see langword="false" /> to disable buffering.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要對傳送至網際網路資源的資料啟用緩衝處理，<see langword="false" /> 則表示要停用緩衝處理。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering%2A> is `true`, the data is buffered in memory so it is ready to be resent in the event of redirections or authentication requests.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering%2A>是`true`，使其以要求時，重新導向或驗證時重新傳送，資料會在記憶體中緩衝。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering%2A> property to disable data buffering.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering%2A>屬性，以停用緩衝處理資料。

trans-unit.source: Setting <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering" /> to <see langword="true" /> might cause performance problems when uploading large datasets because the data buffer could use all available memory.
trans-unit.target: 設定<see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering" />至<see langword="true" />上傳大型資料集，因為資料緩衝區可以使用所有可用的記憶體時可能會造成效能問題。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of decompression that is used.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用的解壓縮類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.DecompressionMethods" /> object that indicates the type of decompression that is used.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Net.DecompressionMethods" />物件，表示會使用的解壓縮類型。

trans-unit.source: The object's current state does not allow this property to be set.
trans-unit.target: 此物件的目前狀態不允許設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: The state object for this request.
trans-unit.target: 這個要求的狀態物件。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request for a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object to use to write data.
trans-unit.target: 開始用來寫入資料之 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: 參考非同步要求的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> method starts an asynchronous request for a stream used to send data for the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>方法會啟動用來將資料傳送資料流的非同步要求<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback method uses the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> method to return the actual stream.
trans-unit.target: 非同步回呼方法會使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法以傳回實際的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> method requires some synchronous setup tasks to complete (DNS resolution, proxy detection, and TCP socket connection, for example) before this method becomes asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>方法需要某些同步安裝程式工作完成 （DNS 解析、 proxy 偵測和 TCP 通訊端連線，例如），這個方法會變成非同步之前。

trans-unit.source: As a result, this method should never be called on a user interface (UI) thread because it might take considerable time (up to several minutes depending on network settings) to complete the initial synchronous setup tasks before an exception for an error is thrown or the method succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，這個方法永遠不可叫用使用者介面 (UI) 執行緒上因為可能需要相當長的時間 （最多幾分鐘，視網路設定而定） 來完成初始同步設定工作之前發生例外狀況的擲回錯誤或此方法成功。

trans-unit.source: To learn more about the thread pool, see [The Managed Thread Pool](~/docs/standard/threading/the-managed-thread-pool.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要了解有關執行緒集區的詳細資訊，請參閱[Managed 執行緒集區](~/docs/standard/threading/the-managed-thread-pool.md)。

trans-unit.source: Your application cannot mix synchronous and asynchronous methods for a particular request.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式不能混用特定要求的同步和非同步方法。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> method, you must use the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method to retrieve the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>方法，則必須使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法，以擷取回應。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> method to make an asynchronous request for a stream instance.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>方法以進行資料流執行個體的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Method" /> property is GET or HEAD.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Method" /> 屬性是 GET 或 HEAD。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.KeepAlive" /> is <see langword="true" />, <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering" /> is <see langword="false" />, <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength" /> is -1, <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked" /> is <see langword="false" />, and <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Method" /> is POST or PUT.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.KeepAlive" /> 是 <see langword="true" />、<see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering" /> 是 <see langword="false" />、<see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength" /> 是 -1、<see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked" /> 是 <see langword="false" />，而且 <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Method" /> 是 POST 或 PUT。

trans-unit.source: The stream is being used by a previous call to <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />
trans-unit.target: 資料流正在由先前對 <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 的呼叫所使用。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.TransferEncoding" /> is set to a value and <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.TransferEncoding" /> 是設定為值，而且 <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked" /> 為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The thread pool is running out of threads.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒集區中的執行緒即將用盡。

trans-unit.source: The request cache validator indicated that the response for this request can be served from the cache; however, requests that write data must not use the cache.
trans-unit.target: 要求快取驗證程式指出，可以從快取處理此要求的回應；不過，寫入資料的要求絕對不能使用快取。

trans-unit.source: This exception can occur if you are using a custom cache validator that is incorrectly implemented.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用實作自訂快取驗證程式不正確，便會發生這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Abort" /> was previously called.
trans-unit.target: 之前已呼叫過 <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Abort" />。

trans-unit.source: In a .NET Compact Framework application, a request stream with zero content length was not obtained and closed correctly.
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET Compact Framework 應用程式中，未取得且未正確關閉內容長度為零的要求資料流。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling zero content length requests, see [Network Programming in the .NET Compact Framework](https://msdn.microsoft.com/subscriptions/downloads/1afx2b0f\(v=vs.80\).aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理零內容長度要求的詳細資訊，請參閱 [.NET Compact Framework 中的網路程式設計](https://msdn.microsoft.com/subscriptions/downloads/1afx2b0f\(v=vs.80\).aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派

trans-unit.source: The state object for this request.
trans-unit.target: 這個要求的狀態物件。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request to an Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 開始對網際網路資源的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous request for a response.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，參考回應的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method starts an asynchronous request for a response from the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法會從網際網路資源啟動回應的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback method uses the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> method to return the actual <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>.
trans-unit.target: 非同步回呼方法會使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>方法以傳回實際<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.ProtocolViolationException> is thrown in several cases when the properties set on the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> class are conflicting.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Net.ProtocolViolationException>上設定的屬性時擲回在幾種情況下<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>類別會互相衝突。

trans-unit.source: This exception occurs if an application sets the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A> property and the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked%2A> property to `true`, and then sends an HTTP GET request.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式設定，就會發生這個例外狀況<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked%2A>屬性`true`，然後將傳送 HTTP GET 要求。

trans-unit.source: This exception occurs if an application tries to send chunked to a server that only supports HTTP 1.0 protocol, where this is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式嘗試區塊傳送至伺服器只支援 HTTP 1.0 通訊協定，其中不支援此功能，就會發生這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This exception occurs if an application tries to send data without setting the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A> property or the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked%2A> is `false` when buffering is disabled and on a keepalive connection (the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A> property is `true`)`.`
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式嘗試傳送資料，而不設定，就會發生這個例外狀況<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked%2A>是`false`時緩衝處理已停用和在 keepalive 連線 (<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A>屬性是`true`)`.`

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown, use the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> properties of the exception to determine the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebException>會擲回，使用<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>和<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性來判斷伺服器的回應例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method requires some synchronous setup tasks to complete (DNS resolution, proxy detection, and TCP socket connection, for example) before this method becomes asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法需要某些同步安裝程式工作完成 （DNS 解析、 proxy 偵測和 TCP 通訊端連線，例如），這個方法會變成非同步之前。

trans-unit.source: As a result, this method should never be called on a user interface (UI) thread because it might take considerable time (up to several minutes depending on network settings) to complete the initial synchronous setup tasks before an exception for an error is thrown or the method succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，這個方法永遠不可叫用使用者介面 (UI) 執行緒上因為可能需要相當長的時間 （最多幾分鐘，視網路設定而定） 來完成初始同步設定工作之前發生例外狀況的擲回錯誤或此方法成功。

trans-unit.source: To learn more about the thread pool, see [[\<topic://cpconthreadpooling>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2be05b06-a42e-4c9d-a739-96c21d673927).
trans-unit.target: 若要了解有關執行緒集區的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \<topic://cpconthreadpooling >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2be05b06-a42e-4c9d-a739-96c21d673927)。

trans-unit.source: Your application cannot mix synchronous and asynchronous methods for a particular request.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式不能混用特定要求的同步和非同步方法。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> method, you must use the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method to retrieve the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>方法，則必須使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法，以擷取回應。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [[\<topic://conUsingNetworkTracing>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e993b7c3-087f-45d8-9c02-9dded936d804).

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method to make an asynchronous request for an Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>進行網際網路資源的非同步要求的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the case of asynchronous requests, it is the responsibility of the client application to implement its own time-out mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 如果非同步要求，它負責用戶端應用程式，來實作其本身的逾時機制。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to do it.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示如何執行它。

trans-unit.source: The stream is already in use by a previous call to <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />
trans-unit.target: 資料流已經由先前對 <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 的呼叫使用。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.TransferEncoding" /> is set to a value and <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.TransferEncoding" /> 是設定為值，而且 <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked" /> 為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The thread pool is running out of threads.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒集區中的執行緒即將用盡。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Method" /> is GET or HEAD, and either <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength" /> is greater than zero or <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Method" /> 是 GET 或 HEAD，而且若不是 <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength" /> 大於零，就是 <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked" /> 為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.KeepAlive" /> is <see langword="true" />, <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering" /> is <see langword="false" />, and either <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength" /> is -1, <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked" /> is <see langword="false" /> and <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Method" /> is POST or PUT.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.KeepAlive" /> 是 <see langword="true" />、<see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering" /> 是 <see langword="false" />；若不是 <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength" /> 為 -1，就是 <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.SendChunked" /> 為 <see langword="false" />；而且 <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Method" /> 是 POST 或 PUT。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> has an entity body but the <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method is called without calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest" /> 具有實體本文，但是不會透過呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的方式來呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength" /> is greater than zero, but the application does not write all of the promised data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength" /> 大於零，但應用程式不會寫入所有承諾的資料

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Abort" /> was previously called.
trans-unit.target: 之前已呼叫過 <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Abort" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of security certificates that are associated with this request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與這個要求關聯的安全憑證集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> that contains the security certificates associated with this request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />，包含與這個要求相關的安全憑證。

trans-unit.source: An application can add a certificate to a collection, but might not have access rights to it.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以將憑證新增至集合，但是可能沒有存取權限。

trans-unit.source: To use a certificate contained in the collection, the application must have the same access rights as the entity that issued the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用包含在集合中的憑證，應用程式必須與發出憑證的實體相同的存取權限。

trans-unit.source: The Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 架構快取的 SSL 工作階段建立時，並嘗試盡可能重複使用快取的工作階段為新的要求。

trans-unit.source: When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 當嘗試重複使用的 SSL 工作階段，架構會使用第一個項目<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>（如果有一個），或嘗試重複使用匿名的工作階段，如果<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>是空的。

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, you shouldn't add a client certificate to a <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> unless you know the server will ask for it.
trans-unit.target: 基於效能考量，您不應該新增用戶端憑證，<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>除非您知道它會要求伺服器。

trans-unit.source: For a code example illustrating how to enumerate the certificates in the client certificate store, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> class.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例示範如何列舉中的用戶端憑證存放區的憑證，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 為設定作業指定的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see langword="Connection" /> HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see langword="Connection" /> HTTP 標頭的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see langword="Connection" /> HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Connection" /> HTTP 標頭的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The request sends the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Connection%2A> property to the Internet resource as the `Connection` HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 要求會傳送<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Connection%2A>屬性做為與網際網路資源`Connection`HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A> property is `true`, the value "Keep-alive" is appended to the end of the `Connection` header.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A>屬性是`true`，「 保持運作 」 的值附加至結尾`Connection`標頭。

trans-unit.source: To clear the `Connection` HTTP header, set the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Connection%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除`Connection`設定 HTTP 標頭，<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Connection%2A>屬性`null`。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Connection%2A> property after the request has been started by calling the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Connection%2A>屬性之後要求已藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The value for this property is stored in <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值儲存在 <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> 中。

trans-unit.source: If WebHeaderCollection is set, the property value is lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果有設定 WebHeaderCollection，將會遺失屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Connection%2A> property to set the value of the Connection HTTP Header.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Connection%2A>屬性來設定連線 HTTP 標頭的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Connection" /> is set to Keep-alive or Close.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Connection" /> 的值已設為 Keep-alive 或 Close。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the connection group for the request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要求的連接群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the connection group for this request.
trans-unit.target: 這個要求的連接群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A> property enables you to associate a request with a connection group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A>屬性可讓您將要求與連接群組產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when your application makes requests to one server for different users, such as a Web site that retrieves customer information from a database server.
trans-unit.target: 當您的應用程式提出要求到一部伺服器不同的使用者，例如資料庫伺服器中擷取客戶資訊的網站時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example show how to use user information to form a connection group, assuming that the variables `username`, `password`, and `domain` are set by the application before this code is called.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用使用者資訊，以形成連接群組，但前提變數`username`， `password`，和`domain`這段程式碼會在呼叫之前由應用程式中設定。

trans-unit.source: Each connection group creates additional connections for a server.
trans-unit.target: 每個連接群組建立其他連接的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: This may result in exceeding the number of connections set by the <see cref="P:System.Net.ServicePoint.ConnectionLimit" /> property for that server.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會導致超過所設定的連接數目<see cref="P:System.Net.ServicePoint.ConnectionLimit" />該伺服器的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="Content-length" /> HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see langword="Content-length" /> HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of data to send to the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 資料位元組數，要傳送至網際網路資源。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates the property has not been set and that there is no request data to send.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1，表示還沒有設定屬性且沒有要傳送的要求資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A> property contains the value to send as the `Content-length` HTTP header with the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A>屬性包含值，以傳送`Content-length`與要求的 HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: Any value other than -1 in the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A> property indicates that the request uploads data and that only methods that upload data are allowed to be set in the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Method%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的-1 以外的任何值<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A>屬性會指出要求上傳資料，並在中設定允許的資料上傳的方法<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Method%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A> property is set to a value, that number of bytes must be written to the request stream that is returned by calling the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> method or both the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> and the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A>屬性設定為值，該位元組數必須寫入要求資料流，藉由呼叫會傳回<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>方法或兩者皆<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>和<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The value for this property is stored in <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值儲存在 <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> 中。

trans-unit.source: If WebHeaderCollection is set, the property value is lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果有設定 WebHeaderCollection，將會遺失屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A> property to the length of the string being posted.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A>来公佈的字串長度屬性。

trans-unit.source: The request has been started by calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream" />, <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />, <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetResponse" />, or <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 要求已藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream" />、<see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />、<see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetResponse" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法啟動。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength" /> value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength" /> 值小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see langword="Content-type" /> HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see langword="Content-type" /> HTTP 標頭的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see langword="Content-type" /> HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Content-type" /> HTTP 標頭的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentType%2A> property contains the media type of the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentType%2A>屬性包含要求的媒體類型。

trans-unit.source: Values assigned to the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentType%2A> property replace any existing contents when the request sends the `Content-type` HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 指派給值<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentType%2A>屬性取代任何現有的內容，當要求傳送`Content-type`HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: To clear the `Content-type` HTTP header, set the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentType%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除`Content-type`設定 HTTP 標頭，<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentType%2A>屬性`null`。

trans-unit.source: The value for this property is stored in <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> .
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值儲存在<xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> is set, the property value is lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>已經設定，將會遺失屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delegate method called when an HTTP 100-continue response is received from the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定從網際網路資源接收 HTTP 100-continue 回應時所呼叫的委派 (Delegate) 方法。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that implements the callback method that executes when an HTTP Continue response is returned from the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 委派，實作從網際網路資源傳回 HTTP Continue 回應時所執行的回呼 (Callback) 方法。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContinueDelegate%2A> property specifies the callback method to call when the client receives a 100-Continue response.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContinueDelegate%2A>屬性指定的回呼方法呼叫時用戶端收到 100-繼續回應。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContinueDelegate%2A> property is set, the client calls the delegate whenever protocol responses of type <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode.Continue?displayProperty=nameWithType> (100) are received.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContinueDelegate%2A>屬性設定，用戶端會呼叫委派每當通訊協定類型的回應<xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode.Continue?displayProperty=nameWithType>(100) 接收。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want the client to display the status of the data being received from the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: 這非常有用，如果您想要顯示的狀態資料從網際網路資源接收的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a timeout, in milliseconds, to wait until the 100-Continue is received from the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在收到伺服器的 100-Continue 以前等候的逾時 (以毫秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The timeout, in milliseconds, to wait until the 100-Continue is received.
trans-unit.target: 要在收到 100-Continue 以前等候的逾時 (以毫秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: If the 100-Continue response is received before the timeout expires, the entity body can be sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果 100-繼續進行之前逾時過期，可以傳送的實體主體，會接收到回應。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cookies associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與要求相關的 Cookie。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieContainer" /> that contains the cookies associated with this request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.CookieContainer" />，包含與這個要求相關的 Cookie。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.CookieContainer%2A> property provides an instance of the <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer> class that contains the cookies associated with this request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.CookieContainer%2A>屬性提供的執行個體<xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>類別，其中包含與此要求相關聯的 cookie。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.CookieContainer%2A> is `null` by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.CookieContainer%2A> 是`null`預設。

trans-unit.source: You must assign a <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer> object to the property to have cookies returned in the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.Cookies%2A> property of the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse> returned by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您必須指派<xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>物件屬性中傳回的 cookie<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse.Cookies%2A>屬性<xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse>傳回<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, cookies are disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 基於安全性理由，預設會停用 cookie。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use cookies, use the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.CookieContainer%2A> property to enable cookies.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用 cookie，使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.CookieContainer%2A>屬性來啟用 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sends a request to a URL and displays the cookies returned in the response.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將要求傳送至的 URL，並顯示在回應中傳回的 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets authentication information for the request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要求的驗證資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.ICredentials" /> that contains the authentication credentials associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.ICredentials" />，包含與要求關聯的驗證認證。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Credentials%2A> property contains authentication information to identify the maker of the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Credentials%2A>屬性包含驗證資訊來識別的要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Credentials%2A> property can be either a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>, in which case the user, password, and domain information contained in the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> object is used to authenticate the request, or it can be a <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache>, in which case the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the request is used to determine the user, password, and domain information to use to authenticate the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Credentials%2A>屬性可以是<xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>、 在哪些情況下使用者、 密碼和網域中所包含的資訊<xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>物件用來驗證要求，或它可以是<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache>的情況下統一的資源要求的識別碼 (URI) 用來判斷要用於驗證要求使用者、 密碼和網域資訊。

trans-unit.source: In most client scenarios, you should use the <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A> property, which contains the credentials of the currently logged on user.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分的用戶端情況下，您應該使用<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>屬性，其中包含目前登入使用者的認證。

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A> property to `true` instead of setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請設定<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>屬性`true`而不是設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> class is being used in a middle-tier application, such as an ASP.NET application, the credentials in the <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A> property belong to the account running the ASP page (the server-side credentials).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>類別用於中介層應用程式，例如 ASP.NET 應用程式中的認證<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>屬性隸屬於執行 ASP 網頁 （伺服器端的認證） 的帳戶。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you would set this property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您會設定此屬性代表其提出要求的用戶端的認證。

trans-unit.source: The NTLM authentication scheme cannot be used to impersonate another user.
trans-unit.target: NTLM 驗證配置不能模擬其他使用者。

trans-unit.source: Kerberos must be specially configured to support impersonation.
trans-unit.target: Kerberos 必須經過特別設定為支援模擬。

trans-unit.source: To restrict HttpWebRequest to one or more authentication methods, use the <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache> class and bind your credentials to one or more authentication schemes
trans-unit.target: 若要限制 HttpWebRequest 一或多個驗證方法，使用<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache>類別，並將您的認證繫結至一個或多個驗證配置

trans-unit.source: Supported authentication schemes include Digest, Negotiate, Kerberos, NTLM, and Basic.
trans-unit.target: 支援的驗證配置包含摘要式、 交涉、 Kerberos、 NTLM 及 Basic。

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, when automatically following redirects, store the credentials that you want to be included in the redirect in a <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache> and assign it to this property.
trans-unit.target: 基於安全性理由，會自動遵循重新導向時，會儲存您想要包含在中的重新導向的認證<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache>並將它指派給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property will automatically be set to `null` upon redirection if it contains anything except a <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會自動設定為`null`時重新導向，如果它包含以外的項目<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache>。

trans-unit.source: Having this property value be automatically set to `null` under those conditions prevents credentials from being sent to any unintended destination.
trans-unit.target: 具有此屬性的值會自動設為`null`在這些情況下不會將認證傳送到任何非預期的目的地。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the credentials for a request.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定為要求的認證。

trans-unit.source: Get or set the <see langword="Date" /> HTTP header value to use in an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於 HTTP 要求中的 <see langword="Date" /> HTTP 標頭值。

trans-unit.source: The Date header value in the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 要求中的 Date 標頭值。

trans-unit.source: If the Date header is `null`, then the return value will be set to <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果日期標頭`null`，則傳回值會設為<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A> property is a standard <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=nameWithType> object and can contain a <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=nameWithType> field of <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A>屬性是一種標準<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件，並可以包含<xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>欄位<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Any kind of time can be set when using the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用時，就可以設定任何一種時間<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set or retrieved, the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A> property is assumed to be <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType> (local time).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>設定或擷取，<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A>假設屬性為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>（本地時間）。

trans-unit.source: The classes in the <xref:System.Net> namespace always write it out the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A> property on the wire during transmission in standard form using GMT (Utc) format.
trans-unit.target: 中的類別<xref:System.Net>命名空間永遠寫出<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A>使用 GMT (Utc) 格式的標準表單中的傳輸期間的網路上的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A> property is set to <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then the `Date` HTTP header is removed from the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Headers%2A> property and the <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，然後在`Date`HTTP 標頭移除<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Headers%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this indicates that the `Date` HTTP header is not included in the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Headers%2A> property and the <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A>屬性是<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，這表示`Date`HTTP 標頭未包含在<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Headers%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The value for this property is stored in <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值儲存在 <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> 中。

trans-unit.source: If WebHeaderCollection is set, the property value is lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果有設定 WebHeaderCollection，將會遺失屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A> is set and an attempt is made to send a <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> with no body, then a <xref:System.Net.ProtocolViolationException?displayProperty=nameWithType> will be thrown by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>, <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Date%2A>設定和嘗試傳送<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>沒有主體，則<xref:System.Net.ProtocolViolationException?displayProperty=nameWithType>會擲回的<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>， <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>，和<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cache policy for this request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個要求的預設快取原則。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy" /> that specifies the cache policy in effect for this request when no other policy is applicable.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy" />，在沒有其他適用的原則時，為這個要求指定作用中的快取原則。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property registers the specified policy for the HTTP and HTTPS schemes.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性註冊指定的原則，針對 HTTP 與 HTTPS 配置。

trans-unit.source: This policy is used for this request if:
trans-unit.target: 如果此原則會使用這項要求：

trans-unit.source: There is no <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CachePolicy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property specified for this request.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CachePolicy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>針對這個要求指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The machine and application configuration files do not specify a cache policy that is applicable to the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) used to create this request.
trans-unit.target: 電腦和應用程式組態檔沒有指定用來建立此要求的快取原則適用以統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: The cache policy determines whether the requested resource can be taken from a cache instead of sending the request to the resource host computer.
trans-unit.target: 快取原則可決定從快取，而不是要求傳送至資源的主機電腦是否可以取得所要求的資源。

trans-unit.source: A copy of a resource is only added to the cache if the response stream for the resource is retrieved and read to the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果資源的回應資料流擷取和讀取資料流末端，則資源的複本只會加入至快取。

trans-unit.source: So another request for the same resource could use a cached copy, depending on the cache policy level for this request.
trans-unit.target: 讓另一個要求相同的資源無法使用快取的副本，根據此要求的快取原則層級。

trans-unit.source: for unrestricted access to network resources.
trans-unit.target: 不受限制存取網路資源。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default maximum length of an HTTP error response.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 HTTP 錯誤回應的預設最大長度。

trans-unit.source: The default maximum length of an HTTP error response.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 錯誤回應的預設最大長度。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than 0 and is not equal to -1.
trans-unit.target: 值小於零且不等於 -1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default for the <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.MaximumResponseHeadersLength" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.MaximumResponseHeadersLength" /> 屬性的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The length, in kilobytes (1024 bytes), of the default maximum for response headers received.
trans-unit.target: 收到的回應標頭的預設最大長度 (以 KB (1024 個位元祖) 為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default configuration file sets this value to 64 kilobytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設組態檔將這個值設為 64 KB。

trans-unit.source: The length of the response header received the response status line and any extra control characters that are received as part of HTTP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 回應標頭的長度會收到回應的狀態行，並收到 HTTP 通訊協定的一部分的任何額外的控制字元。

trans-unit.source: A value of -1 means no limit is imposed on the response headers received; a value of 0 means that all requests fail.
trans-unit.target: 值為-1 表示已接收的回應標頭沒有限制值為 0 表示所有要求會都失敗。

trans-unit.source: This value can also be changed in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這個值也可以變更組態檔中。

trans-unit.source: The impact of this property can be overridden by setting the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.MaximumResponseHeadersLength%2A> property on an instance of the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以設定的覆寫這個屬性影響<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.MaximumResponseHeadersLength%2A>屬性的執行個體上<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>類別。

trans-unit.source: The value is not equal to -1 and is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 值不等於 -1 且小於零。

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous request for a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object to use to write data.
trans-unit.target: 結束用來寫入資料之 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: The pending request for a stream.
trans-unit.target: 資料流的暫止要求。

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous request for a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object to use to write data.
trans-unit.target: 結束用來寫入資料之 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> to use to write request data.
trans-unit.target: 用來寫入要求資料的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> method completes an asynchronous request for a stream that was started by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法完成所啟動的資料流的非同步要求<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object has been returned, you can send data with the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> by using the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.IO.Stream>在傳回物件，您可以使用傳送資料<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must set the value of the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A> property before writing data to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定的值<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A>屬性，才能將資料寫入至資料流。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to close the stream and release the connection for reuse.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來關閉資料流，並釋放以供重複使用的連接。

trans-unit.source: Failure to close the stream causes your application to run out of connections.
trans-unit.target: 無法關閉資料流就會導致您的應用程式連線用完。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法來中止資料流執行個體的非同步要求。
